label: no surgery, no readmission
description: No surgical procedure of the primary site was performed. Patient not readmitted to the same hospital within 30 days of discharge.

label: surgery, unplanned readmission
description: Patient was surgically treated and was then readmitted to the same hospital within 30 days of being discharged. This readmission was unplanned.

label: surgery, planned readmission
description: Patient was surgically treated and was then readmitted to the same hospital within 30 days of being discharged. This readmission was planned (chemotherapy port insertion, revision of colostomy, etc.).

label: surgery, planned and unplanned readmissions
description: Patient was surgically treated and, within 30 days of being discharged, had both a planned and an unplanned readmission to the same hospital.
